Name: OneConfigFile
Instructions: If Yes, program will generate one combined config file all databases in addition to files to group by database name, table, view, and SPs

Name: OneConfigFileName
Instructions: Specify file name only when the OneConfigFile is set to "Yes"

Name: GeneratedConfigFileFolder
Instructions: This is the generated output Config File that can be used in step 4

Name: ExtTableShemaPrefix
Instructions: Prefix added to internal object Schema to differentiate

Name: ExtTablePrefix
Instructions: Prefix added to internal object Table to differentiate

Name: InputObjectsFolder
Instructions: This is where output of step 3 is stored

Name: SchemaMappingFileFullPath
Instructions: This is the same schema mapping file that step 3 used.

Name: ApsExportScriptsFolder
Instructions: This is where APS Export T-SQL Scripts will reside.

Name: SqldwImportScriptsFolder
Instructions: This is where SQLDW Import T-SQL Scripts will reside.

Name: ExternalDataSourceName
Instructions: Name of the external data source. Default Value to start with. However, this can be updated for some individual tables once the config file is generated.

Name: FileFormat
Instructions: Name of the external file format. Default Value to start with. However, this can be updated for some individual tables once the config file is generated.

Name: ExportLocation
Instructions: The prefix of "/prod/adventure_works/testSchema_DimCustomer" which is the individual object location
